item.title: AWS Data Pipeline (Retired)
item.description: Retired, not available for new customers. Succeeded by Glue

item.title: AWS Glue
item.description: Data integration service to process/prepare data before analysis. Data catalog to manage data from different sources in a central place. ETL pipelines to load data into data warehouses/data lakes etc.

item.title: AWS Kinesis Data Firehose
item.description: What is Kinesis Data Firehose? Streaming ETL or streamig data pipeline. Not this [[data-pipeline|Data Pipeline]] though! Load streaming data into OpenSearch, Redshift, S3, or 3rd party HTTP endpoints. Batch, compress, buffer and encrypt data before loading to minimize storage needs at destination Read streaming data from [[kinesis-data-streams|Kinesis data streams]] Scales elastically with demand Replicates data across AZ for high availability and durability. Use Kinesis Agent installed servers to stream data to Firehose.
